test_cases.description: Verify that daily wage formula field in leave policy is visually greyed out when payroll settings daily wage calculator overrides it. Confirm visual indicator communicates the override is active.
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: Day off to not include salary proration
test_cases.description: Verify Daily Wage Calculation configuration UI allows selection of calculation basis (calendar days, working days, custom days). Test that form accepts 26 working days configuration and displays it correctly.
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Test Daily Wage Calculator configuration interface: verify calculation basis dropdown displays options (calendar days, working days, custom days), confirm salary components selection UI is functional, validate that formula override visual indicators (greyed-out fields) clearly communicate when payroll settings override leave policy configurations
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that unpaid leave deduction remarks display correct number of days for February (29 days for leap year, 28 for non-leap year) instead of 31 days
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that unpaid leave deduction displays daily rate from the leave occurrence month, not the payroll processing month
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: Proration not as per working days
test_cases.description: Verify that salary proration calculation displays correctly when daily wage setting is enabled and work week has all 7 days configured as working days
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays use correct temporal context: display correct number of days for the specific month (accounting for leap years) and show daily rate from leave occurrence month rather than payroll processing month
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Access and Configure Daily Wage Calculator
steps: Select calculation type from dropdown (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Choose salary components to include in calculation
Verify system applies calculation based on selected parameters

task_flows.flow_name: Configure End of Service Leave Encashment
steps: Choose salary components (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select calculation method (Calendar Days, Working Days, or Custom Days)
Configure specific leave types for end-of-service calculations
Select day calculation type (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Choose calculation basis (custom days, calendar days, or working days)
If payroll month is open, reject existing prorated transactions
Confirm new proration settings are applied

task_flows.flow_name: Process Unpaid Leave with Daily Wage Calculation
steps: Receive unpaid leave request from employee
System determines applicable leave policy (calendar or working days)
System calculates total working days for leave period
System subtracts public holidays from working days
System calculates daily pay rate using configured daily wage calculator
System generates payroll deduction based on calculated daily rate
Receive unpaid leave request from employee
Verify leave policy configuration (calendar or working days)
System calculates total working days for leave period
System subtracts public holidays from working days
System calculates daily pay rate based on salary and day calculation type
Verify payroll deduction is generated in payroll module
Confirm deduction amount displays correctly in payroll table
Select calculation type: calendar days, working days, or custom days
Choose salary components to include (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Confirm system applies calculation to relevant payroll processes
Navigate to End of Service Eligibility section
Select salary components (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select calculation method (Calendar Days, Working Days, or Custom Days)
Configure specific leave types eligible for encashment
Verify settings are applied to end-of-service calculations
Choose calculation method (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select day calculation type (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Verify policy appears in leave policies list
Select Calculation Basis (custom days, calendar days, or working days)
Review impact message about active unpaid amounts
If payroll month is open: Reject existing prorated salary transactions
Resave prorated salary transactions with new settings
Confirm new proration settings are applied

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Test Daily Wage Calculator configuration interface: verify calculation basis dropdown displays options (calendar days, working days, custom days), confirm salary components selection UI is functional, validate that formula override visual indicators (greyed-out fields) clearly communicate when payroll settings override leave policy configurations

Verify that unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays use correct temporal context: display correct number of days for the specific month (accounting for leap years) and show daily rate from leave occurrence month rather than payroll processing month

not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved - bug has been fixed, nothing to test in current system
Requires verification of backend calculation logic (leap year day counting in gratuity formula), not UI testable

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
